message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I propose a price of $11500 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to present a compromise. I am willing to consider $11000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counterpropose a price of $10800 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I am willing to accept $11200 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $10900 for the product.

Thank you for your final counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a common ground. In order to move forward, I am willing to accept $11100 for the product. I believe this price offers a reasonable balance for both parties.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. My final counteroffer is $10950 for the product.

Thank you for your final counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to accept $11050 for the product. I believe this price offers a fair compromise for both parties.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I would like to propose one last counteroffer of $10980 for the product.
